title: Orange â€” Huanglongbing (Citrus greening)
description: A bacterial disease transmitted by psyllids, causing yellowing, misshapen fruit, and tree decline; manage vectors and follow local eradication guidelines.

treatment.chemical: No curative treatment available. Control psyllid vectors with insecticides.
treatment.organic: Remove infected trees, manage psyllid populations with beneficial insects, and apply horticultural oils.
